question: i am a 34 yearl old female. i have rsd/crps, fibromyalgia and type 2 diabetes being controleed by metformin.yesterday my french doors were stuck and i pulled on the handle and felt a really sharp pain in my back. the pain is between my lower back and rib cage on the left side. i thought it may be muscular so have applied heat rubs, baths, ibuprofen and paracetamol. nothing helps. the pain eminates across my back too. is this fibro symptoms or have i got soemthing else wrong. please help. i have no other symptoms other than the pain in my back.
title: help!!!!
